description-0:
Explanation: Behind each card is a number.
Any number you click or touch will be added to your total.
You can tap
description-1:
numbers in order to reach the highest possible amount.
You can also tap a number that has already been revealed several times.
description-0-restaurants: You are in a foreign city for
description-1-restaurants:
days and want to go out for dinner every evening.
When you click or tap on a restaurant, you visit a restaurant and the number of stars is added to your sum.
You want to maximize your enjoyment and therefore reach the highest possible sum.
Already visited restaurants can be visited again.
instructions: Flip cards to reveal numbers. You have %turns turns to reach the highest possible sum. You can select an already flipped card as many times as you want.
